name: Nightmare on Ra Street
description:
Nightmare on Ra Street

A night of mystery, dastardly plans, and supernatural horrors await as a group of four high school students decide that the best way to show Zuri, a foreign exchange student staying with Natalie, the true meaning of Halloween by investigating a story of a woman in white who haunts a local manor.

-A short kinetic novel with the cast of Rising Angels: Reborn returning in a new Alternate Universe setting!

-The current version only has the Kika storyline. Expect to see the Faye storyline coming out someday!

-Writing done by Chief of IDHAS Studios

-Art done by Geckos of Ithaqua Labs
